Class Slope

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.mesakit.map.measurements.geographic.Angle

All Implemented Interfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.collection.NextValue<Angle>, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.factory.MapFactory<Long,Angle>, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.numeric.Arithmetic<Angle>, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.numeric.Castable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.numeric.CastTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.numeric.DoubleQuantizable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.numeric.IntegerNumeric<Angle>, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.numeric.Maximizable<Angle>, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.numeric.Minimizable<Angle>, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.numeric.Quantizable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.numeric.QuantumComparable<Angle>, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.string.Stringable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.string.StringSource, com.telenav.kivakit.validation.Validatable, Serializable, Comparable<Angle>
public class Slope extends Angle
A slope angle, such as for the steepness of the rise or fall of a roadway. Supports basic mathematical operations and supplies a quantum() in integral degrees.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
